question: Ministry of Corporate Affairs authorised ISROâ€™s arm Antrix to move petition before which organisation, to wind up Devas?
explanation:
The Ministry of Corporate Affairs has authorised Antrix, the commercial arm of ISRO, to move a petition before the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) to wind up Bengaluru-based start-up Devas.
The Ministry has authorised Chairman and MD of Antrix to present the petition under the Section 271 of Companies Act. Three months ago, US Federal Court ordered Antrix Corporation to pay USD 1.2 billion to Devas Multimedia Private Ltd.
